p: The first case of COVID-19 in Turkey was reported on 11 March 2020, much later than the virus had spread to European countries. As of April 1, the Ministry of Health of Turkey announced that COVID-19 had reached all over Turkey, exhibiting the highest spread in Istanbul. The first full-length SARS-CoV-2 genome in Turkey was isolated from a patient in Kayseri province and released on 13 April 2020. Herein, we analyzed full-length SARS-CoV-2 genomes from three patients in Istanbul together with their clinical findings.
